body.p: While we regret your cancelation, we understand that life happens and many things arise that are out of our control. If you must cancel your reservation with AirClassroom, you must cancel two days before your scheduled event in order to have your money refunded. Since your payment included your deposit, it is important to meet this two day deadline in order to receive your full payment back.
Cancelations within one day of the event will result in only 50% of your payment being refunded. Day-of cancelations cannot be refunded.
